public class IteratorEntryCheckboxElement extends CheckboxValueElement
A special checkbox to select an entry under an iterator

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • getVisible

      public Boolean getVisible()
      Description copied from class: TestableElement
      Checks if this element is currently rendered on page
      Overrides:
      getVisible in class TestableElement
      Returns:
      true only if the checkbox is editable. An iterator-entry-selection checkbox is only considered visible when there's an actual checkbox (aka in editable mode), instead of just the containing cell being visible. An iterator-entry-selection checkbox is perceived differently from regular checkboxes as it doesn't really have the distinctions between View vs Edit modes.

    • getValue

      public String getValue()
      Bizarre backwards compatibility hack. In smoke tests iterator entry check boxes, unlike normal check boxes, have a string value of "", not "false" if they are not checked.
      Overrides:
      getValue in class ValueElement
